alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 06 at 12:38AM EDT until July 06 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central Ohio, northeast Ohio and northwest Ohio, including the following counties, in north central Ohio, Ashland, Crawford, Huron, Knox, Marion, Morrow and Richland. In northeast Ohio, Holmes and Wayne. In northwest Ohio, Hancock, Seneca, Wood and Wyandot. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts. Additional rainfall of at lest 2 inches is possible with isolated higher amounts. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
